description: A comprehensive digital wellness application designed to help families manage screen time, track habits, monitor mood, and ensure healthy sleep patterns for children

primaryPurple.usage: Primary accent color, headers, selected states

properties.name: _isParent
properties.description: Determines if logged-in user is parent or child

properties.name: _childName
properties.description: Name of the child being monitored

methods.name: setUserType
methods.description: Sets whether the user is a parent or child

methods.name: setChildName
methods.description: Sets the child's name for personalization

routes.description: Initial login screen with parent/child toggle

routing.navigationPattern: Named Routes with pushReplacementNamed for auth flow

parentDashboard.name: ParentDashboard
parentDashboard.purpose: Main dashboard for parents to monitor child's digital wellness

childDashboard.name: ChildDashboard
childDashboard.purpose: Main dashboard for children with gamified wellness tracking

moodJournal.name: MoodJournal
moodJournal.purpose: Private journal for child to track emotions daily

appBar.title: Your Journal
appBar.subtitle: Private - Only you can see this

content.title: How are you feeling right now?

content.note: Had fun at football practice today!

habitsTracker.name: HabitsTracker
habitsTracker.purpose: Track daily healthy habits with visual progress indicators

breakReminder.name: BreakReminderDialog
breakReminder.purpose: Encourage child to take healthy breaks from screen

description.text: You've been on your phone for 45 minutes.

motivationalText.text: Taking breaks helps your brain and body feel better! üíö

screenTimeDetails.name: ScreenTimeDetails
screenTimeDetails.purpose: Detailed breakdown of screen time sessions

moodView.name: MoodView
moodView.purpose: Comprehensive mood tracking and visualization for parents

content.title: Calendar
content.hint: Tap a day to see more details

sharedNote.label: Shared note from Aarav -
sharedNote.note: Had a fight with my best friend. Feeling really upset.

appUsageReport.name: AppUsageReport
appUsageReport.purpose: Detailed app usage breakdown with categorization

reportsScreen.name: ReportsScreen
reportsScreen.purpose: Comprehensive analytics and insights for parents

insight.text: Great progress! Screen time decreased by 15% this week.
Sleep schedule is consistent. Keep it up!
Mood improved on days with less screen time.

settingsScreen.name: SettingsScreen
settingsScreen.purpose: Configuration for parental controls and app preferences

designPatterns.cardBasedLayout: All major sections are presented as cards with consistent styling
designPatterns.colorCoding: Different sections have distinct background colors for quick scanning
designPatterns.progressIndicators: Circular progress for main metrics, linear progress for details
designPatterns.gamification: Emojis, streaks, and encouragement messages for children
designPatterns.parentPerspective: Summary cards with action buttons leading to detailed views
designPatterns.childPerspective: Interactive, emoji-rich interface with immediate feedback
designPatterns.dataVisualization: fl_chart library for bar charts, line charts, and pie charts
designPatterns.consistency: Consistent rounded corners (8-28px), spacing (8-24px), and color usage

keyFeatures: Sleep pattern tracking with quality scoring
Daily habit tracking with visual progress

buildInstructions.production: flutter build apk && flutter build ios
